Reviews.Title: “A very good place to stay in Branson, Missouri”
Reviews.Author: John H
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Best Western Musical Capital Inn at Branson, MO. I was very pleased with the place. It was my second time staying there. I went back because they sent me a postcard for a package deal. The room was clean and well appointed. It was very quiet and peaceful. The common areas were well done and the pool was clean and inviting. The hot tub was off limits because of an electrical problem. Also, the breakfast was good but not exceptional. Very friendly staff and they made us feel welcome there.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Ermakay
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at all the Best Westerner's in Branson, and we like this one the best. All the staff are friendly, helpful and knowledgeable about Branson attractions. We stayed on the second floor. The room was very clean. The room had a refrigerator, microwave, iron, coffee maker, two comfortable beds. Everything worked, we did not have any problems. The rooms were larger than the Best Western at the Landing's rooms. We were located on the East side so we had a nice view of the hills. We were able to purchase our tickets for a show there at the motel. It was really convenient because when we got to the theater it was pouring down rain and we did not have to wait in line. The breakfast was good, we had bacon, eggs, juice, coffee, and donuts. We really liked the location because it was right off highway 76 on Sheppard of Hills Express.

Reviews.Title: “Looking for a good place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Adela V
Reviews.Content: This was my 3rd stay at this hotel. Find it clean, price is right. Staff very friendly and helpful. One of reasons I like this hotel, it is conveniently just off the strip on one of the easily navigated alternate routes that make getting around much easier. The seven of us were very pleased with our connectiong rooms so that visiting was easy. One of the shows was located across the street and the other show was located next door of the hotel. We will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “first stay here”
Reviews.Author: voyager413
Reviews.Content: our first stay at this motel. Has the standard hot/cold breakfast's each morning, with them changing out a few items offered each morning. The first night we stayed in one of their newer rooms, with a FIRM mattress. Couldn't handle that, the housekeeping staff went out of their way in order to make the bed softer with extra mattress pads. That didn't help much, so the front desk personnel moved us to another room, with no hassle at all. If you want to see customer service on display, try this motel, you will not be disappointed. Rooms are well kept, with plenty of linens to accomadate the must demanding guest. The A/C units in these rooms DO CYCLE on and off, there is no constant fan blowing. The handicapped rooms do not have double sinks.

Reviews.Title: “Great room”
Reviews.Author: MaryEllen K
Reviews.Content: We always stay at this hotel when we go to Branson. It is conveniently just off the strip on one of the easily navigated alternate routes that make getting around much easier. It is near several of our favorite eating spots, including Steak and Shake and the Imax building. The staff are all friendy and helpful. Our favorite room has a very comfortable king bed and a Jacuzzi bathtub. On a trip last summer, we had a mini-family reunion. The hotel was worked with me to arrange us so that we had connecting rooms and/or rooms directly across the hall so that visiting was easy even with young children to keep up with.

Reviews.Title: “BEST IN BRANSON”
Reviews.Author: JoMoMissouri
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a three day stay at Branson Music Capitol Inn and it was great as always. We had made reservations for two nights and they were ready when we arrived. Even though they had several new employees, they still new us when we checked in. The hotel is always the cleanest and has all the amenities that you will need. Although we didn't get to use the indoor pool and hot tub this time, it looked very inviting. The breakfast was very good with a lot to select from, the Sunday breakfast was especially good. The gift shop also has tickets available for Branson shows and can get the best seats available. The lobby is spacious and very relaxing. I don't think there is a better place to stay in Branson for the price. Be sure to go in and check them out.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: WiscoTravelor
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Branson for two nights and did not have reservations when we arrived. Best Western Music Capital Inn was in the perfect location (off the strip but not even 2 minutes away.) Also, great prices for the rooms. It was VERY clean, beds were super comfortable and very quiet. Fridge and microwave in each room. Pool area was very clean and didn't smell like chlorine that makes you choke when you walk in. Breakfast was good! We stayed two nights and told the cleaning staff we didn't need our rooms cleaned and they actually listened! We put the "do not disturb" tags on our doors and no one bothered us (not the same I can say for other hotels.) We only had one room separating us from the elevator and I didn't hear it at all. Staff was very friendly and helpful. I would completely recommend someone to stay here and would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Best stay yet in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Obiedawg
Reviews.Content: This has been my 3rd trip to Branson. Our stay at this hotel was by far the best experience ever. The entire staff is very friendly and pay much attention to all details. Tony (front desk) was very personable and went out of his way to answer all questions and needs. I am extremely impressed with all aspects of our stay here for 4 days and 3 nights. Next trip will my first time i will book at the same Hotel rather than try a new experience. The entire property was very clean and each and every employee was very personable and attentive to out needs. Kudos !

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cinmc_2012
Reviews.Content: Very Friendly, called to make arrangements, Brenda was very nice and reservations were made quick and easy. All the staff greeted you when you met them. Room was very nice and clean. Enjoyed the hot tub and pool which is open til 12:00. Breakfast had a large assortment and was fresh/hot and someone was taking care of breakfast area the whole time I was there. Will definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Mini Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Pat F
Reviews.Content: The hotel had very comfortable and clean rooms. Located in a good location to shows. My granddaughter and I enjoyed the stay. Plan on staying there again when my husband and I come for a fall getaway.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Shelia A
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed both the staff and service – friendly and courteous. Great breakfast included. They helped us when we were at a loss during the Branson tornado. The pool and hot tub are great assets to the property.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay.”
Reviews.Author: Statestraveling
Reviews.Content: This hotel is priced for the area and for what they offer. Wonderful stay. Wonderful staff. Great little breakfast. Clean roomy rooms. Off the main street but that isn't a bad thing either. Priced right for location. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nellie W
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed here for a family reunion. The front-desk staff gave awesome customer service along with willingness to accommodate all their quests. The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable. The microwaves and refrigerators in the rooms were a plus. It’s in a very quite location with easy access to all the events and attractions. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Recommendation for staying at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bill W
Reviews.Content: During the middle of July 2012, we spent two nights at this hotel. They are very accommodating to their guests. They have an indoor pool and hot tub to protect the guests from inclement weather. Branson has become a mecca for live entertainment shows and tickets for these shows can be purchased at the hotel. The hotel is close to some of the entertainment centers. The hotel provides a full breakfast to its guests to include two waffle makers and batter for the guests to prepare their own waffles. We had a choice of strawberry batter or regular batter for our waffles. We stayed at the peak season with kids out of school and families taking their vacations at Branson. Yet, the hotel was quiet and the guests were respectful of each other. If I return to the Branson area, I would put this hotel at the top of the list to seek a room.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: geauxtigers1393
Reviews.Content: This hotel was awesome for the price! The breakfast is included and has plenty of choices to please all in your group! The internet didn't work properly the entire time, but that wasn't too big a deal as we were on vacation! The hotel was very clean and the staff was extremely friendly. I would most definitely stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “Felt like home”
Reviews.Author: Wilma H
Reviews.Content: This is my 8th trip to Branson, and 7 times I have stayed at this property. They make you feel at home, and if you find something not to your liking, they take care of it right away. The light over the vanity burned out the second day we were there and they came and took care of it while we were at breakfast. That is what I call quick service. Everyone is friendly and helpful. The rates are comparible to other motels, but the ammenities are so much better. This is the cleanest motel I have stayed in, and so easy to get to and avoid traffic. I highly recommend this establishment, and next trip we will be sure to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Price”
Reviews.Author: KIntlTravel
Reviews.Content: Our softball team stayed at this hotel. I was pleasantly surprised at the value. The rooms were very clean; service was impeccible; microwave/refrigerator in the room were a bonus; breakfast had a lot of variety; laundry machines were very useful (since we had lots of softball clothes to wash); and the indoor pool offered a lot of entertainment for the kids. There was good sound proofing in the rooms. I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dennis F
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great. Very friendly staff,clean rooms and good breakfast. They care about your stay . You have to meet the breakfast lady , very sweet and hard working. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Glenda L
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for three nights on our first trip to Branson. At check-in, we mentioned to the front desk clerk that it was our first time there. She immediately gave us extra information to help us with our stay. Our room was everything you could ask for! Clean, comfortable, quiet. The bathroom was the SMALLEST that I have ever seen! The toilet has about a quarter inch clearance of the door. But, the shower was fabulous! And, it was convenient to have a second sink right outside of the bathroom! The breakfast was a little skimpy - I have seen much better. They only have apples and (sour!) oranges for fruit. It must be only every other day that they put out sausage and hash browns with the scrambled eggs. My husband went to Wal-Mart to buy himself some Cheerios for breakfast. The pool looked nice, but we just didn't have time to enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: nebcow
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a family reunion. The hotel is not a five star property, but it was clean and the staff was very nice. The pool was decent and they provide a basic breakfast in the morning. The hotel is also conveniently located in the center of many of the local attractions so it's not too much of hassle to get anywhere. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Lipglossd
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed here during a family trip to Branson, Missouri. First off, I've stayed a lot of places in this city. This was one of the best places I've been in Branson. Every single staff member was ridiculously nice and helpful...just amazing service. The rooms have been completely renovated, they're nice and modern with super comfy bedding and flat screen TVs. The rooms were spotless and stocked with all kinds of amenities. I even liked the new "clean remotes" in the rooms. They serve a continental breakfast, but it actually has real food on it....biscuits and gravy, sausages, eggs, blueberry waffles...all tasted good. They also have a super nice saltwater pool which I found to be a lot more enjoyable than other pools. All around awesome stay! Will definitely be coming back to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet, friendly”
Reviews.Author: Bev B
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel many times, and each time we have enjoyed our stay. The hotel is clean, quiet, and the staff is always friendly. We both have bad backs, so finding comfortable beds is sometimes a problem. The beds we slept on were firm, but had padding on the top which help soften them up a bit and helped our backs. The last time we stayed at this hotel our adult sons stayed in the adjoining room (4th floor). They enjoyed a flat screen TV, while we had the old style TV. Not a big issue. I liked the TV "sanitary remote controls" they now have, which enable them to be wiped down easily (hate to think of how many germs are on hotel remote controls!). Groups frequent this hotel, but they seem to quiet down by bedtime and so far this hasn't been a problem for us. The room air conditioner works well and isn't too noisy. When we were there the last time it was over 100 degrees, but we had a cool room. The breakfast at this hotel is typical of other hotel free breakfasts (maybe slightly better than some). My husband & I choose to eat at local restaurants for better quality food, but it is fair quality. The indoor pool and hot tub are good size and clean. We always enjoy using them. We visit Branson about twice a year, and have stayed in many other hotels. This one is still the best we have tried for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in Branson, MO”
Reviews.Author: janetmp
Reviews.Content: I just returned from a week long stay in Branson, MO with my daughter and young granddaughters. We stayed at the Best Western Music Capital Inn. It was very close to all the action, located across from the Shoji Tabuchi Theater. All the employees were very friendly and most helpful. The free breakfasts were very popular with my girls, and there were many choices - cereals, eggs, pancakes, fruit, yogurts, pastries, etc. A ticketing center was located in their gift shop, and the employees were very helpful in suggesting which shows and activities would be most suitable for a 2 and 7 year old. We had awesome seats at the shows. Coming back to the hotel in the evenings and enjoying the indoor pool was wonderfully relaxing. Again, I can't say enough about the friendliness and helpfulness of all the employees. We'll be sure to stay here again the next time we're in town.

Reviews.Title: “RETURN STAY”
Reviews.Author: Frances43706
Reviews.Content: We come to Branson once a year from Mississippi and this is where we want to stay. Easy access to shows, restaurants, and shopping., Clean rooms and friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: Brunz2
Reviews.Content: We had our family reunion at the Best Western Music Capital Inn. Everyone was friendly and helpful. The rooms were very clean. Breakfast was hot . The lady that worked in the breakfast room was friendly. We had over 90 attendees at our reunion and all of the hotel staff was helpful. The kids loved the pool. We would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Totosma
Reviews.Content: Clean room with refrigerator and microwave. Good pool and hot tub. Nice variety for breakfast. Great location that is within walking distance to many restaurants, shopping and shows. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Vicky C
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at the Best Western Music Capital Inn. The staff at the front desk was very friendly and helpful. It was easy to get tickets for all the shows right at the hotel. The room was very nice and clean. Breakfast was hot and there was a lot of variety. The lady that worked in the breakfast room was really friendly and made a point to greet you in the morning. We didn't use the pool, but it was a really nice indoor pool area. Everything was clean and nice. Really enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Joyce M
Reviews.Content: We stay at the Music Capital Inn in Branson, MO every two years. Our H.S. class meets there for our reunions. It is a great place to stay. The rooms are great. They have a wonderful breakfast bar in the mornings that include hot entrees. The staff is friendly and very accommodationg to larger groups. They have let us use the breakfast room for meetings and coffee. It has a wonderful pool. We wouldn't stay anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Good time in Branson with friends”
Reviews.Author: frances k
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean. Maids were especially considerate. Front dest personnel very helpful. Food was pleantiful and good.

Reviews.Title: “Back Again to The Music Capitol Inn”
Reviews.Author: 964ACN
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing place to stay in Branson! Wonderful staff, beautiful facilities, great location and easy in and out in traffic. Our group from Denver always stays here when we come to Branson each April. Wouldn't stay anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful time!”
Reviews.Author: Jerry V
Reviews.Content: We were part of a Class reunion that had met here the last 3 times and will be back in 2 years. We have always been very pleased with the accommadations and the very pleasant employees. We look forward to returning in two years. Jerry and Sharon V. Kansas

Reviews.Title: “Our second family”
Reviews.Author: Beverly W
Reviews.Content: The staff is just like family! They call us by name. They are genuinely friendly and always are very kind and helpful. The rooms are clean and we always have a wonderful stay. The breakfast is great with many different options. We think it is the best place to stay in Branson. Jerry & Beverly Wortham Rose Bud, AR

Reviews.Title: “Terrific in all areas!”
Reviews.Author: Susan B
Reviews.Content: This was a terrific place to stay in Branson. Just off the main strip--easy access to everything. Clean,modern, reasonably priced, VERY FRIENDLY STAFF, huge pool. Breakfast was great each day. Breakfast area overlooks pool. In the room are 2 sinks--one in bathing/toilet area and one outside. Very helpful with multiple people occupying the room. The atmosphere was just the best I've every been in. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: RetiredLibrarian_8
Reviews.Content: There are a few Best Western motels in the Branson area, but the Music Capital Inn is the best! The building (with elevator) has bright, large, clean rooms and the location is excellent for access to Hwy 76 - the main drag in Branson. There are plenty of hot and cold items included in the complimentary breakfast, and the woman who prepares the breakfast is a treasure trove of tourist information. The rest of the staff is friendly and very efficient. There is a good size indoor pool - though no outside recreation areas. Excellent value for the money!

Reviews.Title: “Thanks to Best Western Employees”
Reviews.Author: Brenda A
Reviews.Content: My experience was awesome, the employees like Brenda and the other ladies I met were the best. I was working at the Local Pizza Hut and I am from out of town. I stayed 4 nights and my room was cleaned to perfection, food and coffee perfect, Thank you so much to the receptionist that let me borrow her lighter, couldn't ask for more. THANK YOU SO MUCH LADIES!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Lots of extras”
Reviews.Author: DeeDee1964Briercrest
Reviews.Content: This is an ideally located hotel for visiting any Branson attractions. Having two sinks in the room was great. Nicely appointed rooms. Gift shop and tickets available for local attractions. Nice lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Hotel”
Reviews.Author: angie h
Reviews.Content: The staff was very helpful in helping me book a room.We had 7 people together on this vacation so we got joining rooms with two queen beds in each room. We had plenty of space and the beds were so comfortable.We had a small problem with the fridge in which the maintenance staff fixed right away!! We traveled with four children and they did an AWESOME job of putting us two doors down from the pool,game room, and laundry room. My husband really enjoyed the sauna and hottub....while the kids enjoyed the pool. The staff at the gift shop did a wonderful job at helping us buy our tickets for attractions and I purchased a couple of items while I was there. Breakfast was ok. .lots to choose from cereal,waffles,eggs,gravy,and donuts were just of few of the several choices.Overall this was one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in and will stay there again!!!!! Oh ....and it is located just a little ways down from all of the attractions and shows with lots of great food choices just down the way!!!!! Thank You Best Western!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “convenient location”
Reviews.Author: lkysmyl
Reviews.Content: The location is located close to shows and eating places as well as the malls. It was not damaged during the tornado at all. The folks were friendly and effecient who checked us in/out at the hotel. The breakfast area was very clean and the hostess kept the coffee and other containers full. They have a full menu with the eggs, biscuits, gravy, waffles, fruits, yogurt, dry cereals and other goodies. The rooms were nice in size with comfortable beds and pillows. The room had an adequate working space. The bath was good size with a great shower. The only negatives I saw were the bathroom needed a good cleaning around the edges of the floor as did the carpet in the room. There was dust and hair in the corner of the bathroom and a build-up of dust around the edges of the carpet. This needs to be checked out regulary and not let the dirt/dust accumulate like this. Over-all, was satisfied with this hotel and would stay here again as well as recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “It does have friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: MDEMRO
Reviews.Content: Fairly clean hotel. Previous reviews about the breakfast were correct. The eggs are not good. The sausages are pre-cooked. Poor fruit choices (apples, and canned peaches). The hotel is full of large groups all the time I believe (we were one of them). The Waffles looked good, but I don't eat them. The toaster kept popping the circuit breaker. Beds were not the best quality.

Reviews.Title: “WOW! Wonderful staff and great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: genesis16ministries
Reviews.Content: A great hotel is not made by fancy amenities (although they contribute), or new designs, or even big rooms... A great hotel is made by good staff and a clean environment... This hotel exceeds in both. It was like visiting grandmas house. There is an amazing woman in the breakfast area who treats everyone like family. She remembered each day where we had been based on the previous days breakfast table discussion, and she took genuine interest. She rembered my kids names and even put out fruit loops for them. The staff in the gift shop was incredibly helpful and didn't push to sell us tickets. Best of all there was a Gideon's in our room that wasn't hidden in some drawer but was put out on the table and left open with a special note from the hotel offering us a prayer, that was so special to us and we hope that more businesses will take care over Gods word in such a way.

Reviews.Title: “Okay”
Reviews.Author: 33959Merip
Reviews.Content: Great location! Near everything. The rooms were average to nice, beds were comfy. No problems with room temp, shower, etc., everything worked fineFound hairs in bathroom which we did not like. The room did have a refrig great for drinks or leftovers. The pool and hot tub area were very nice and the pool was warm. The breakfast was okay - biscuits, gravy, make your own waffles, eggs (powdered) sausage. Not much fruit and no kids cereals which surprised us (raisin bran, corn flakes?, Cheerios). But the breakfast room was very clean and they kept everything stocked. The big problem we had was we requested a quiet room way in advance. When we arrived the hotel was empty - literally 1 other car in the lot. They could have put us anywhere. The next day we smelled smoke, then heard construction noise. LOUD! and men yelling back and forth in the hall over & over. Turns out they were redoing some of the rooms to be handicap accessible. Front desk offered the option of changing rooms but that was of course a major PIA - and the whole goal was to spend the day relaxing - front desk went to talk to workers who yelled out "are they complaining already?" They were quieter after that but pounding and drilling is what it is. It was annoying since they could have put us on a lower floor, or since they were redoing several rooms, start the workers on another floor. They gave us a $20 credit at checkout and while I appreciate the effort, it wasn't enough.

Reviews.Title: “Best in Branson”
Reviews.Author: BJR95
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed at several hotels in Branson over the years and this is our favorite. Best breakfast, quietest rooms, great value for the money. Could not ask for more.

Reviews.Title: “A fun New Years in Branson”
Reviews.Author: MOMeyer4
Reviews.Content: Very nice pool and clean rooms. The gentlemen at the front desk seemed mad about something and was rude to my 2 teen daughters. Other than that we had no complaints. I think we would stay there again but the whole place needs a good update. We were told they are closed now until Feb. 2012 to do much needed updates.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: Janice W
Reviews.Content: When we arrived we discovered that Best Western head office had accidentally cancelled our 5 day reservation. Thanks to the efforts of the enitre staff, namely Brenda, Celia and Sue who worked very diligently to determine the cause and correct the error. Despite the hotel being fully booked Brenda had held a room for us as she thought something had gone very wrong with our reservation. The staff did everything possible to make our stay so pleasant. The rooms were immaculate and the beds and pillows comfortable. We loved the pool and jacuzzi. The breakfast must be without a doubt one of the finest buffet breakfast in Branson. Thanks for making our New Years so pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Above average stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: jrkstl
Reviews.Content: Just stayed here this past weekend, and found it to be a decent alternative to the long list of cheap, bad Branson motels. While no one part of our stay was truly outstanding, there wasn't anything terrible to report either. The beds were a step above most hotel/motels in Branson, and the pillows were definitely an improvement over the norm. The decor wasn't the typical country oak normally found in town, but could stand a remodel as it was a bit dated. I really liked the extra sink outside of the main bathroom sink, which made getting ready even easier for me and my travel partner. Breakfast was okay with the normal list of choices, but I wouldn't say anything stood out. I found the 9:30 AM cut off time a bit early, especially for a weekend. Overall, a nice place to stay with very friendly help. I would consider staying here again. Side note - why does every hotel/motel in Branson feel it necessary to have the Bible out and opened up to a specific chapter in every room? Maybe it's just me, but I find this to be a bit much.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable!”
Reviews.Author: Dirtfarmerjake
Reviews.Content: This hotel came as a recommendation from friends...excellent choice. Go talk to the woman at the shows reservation desk, she's very helpful! We had just been to Pigeon Forge before Branson, seeing many shows there, she let us know which ones would just be repeats from there...and which ones were very similar to each other right there in Branson. Don't overlook the little shows, there is some incredible talent there to.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel Ever”
Reviews.Author: Salena D
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff is great! They went above and beyond to please us. We needed to go somewhere and not 1 but 4 staff members offered to bring us in there own vehicles. They also provided us with helpful information regarding Branson and gave us coupons for the attractions. The breakfast they provide is very good...The rooms were very very clean. Best hotel Ever!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: ggsgrandma
Reviews.Content: Best Western Music Capital Inn is the place we stay every time we go to Branson. It is extremely clean, the staff is very accommodating and the breakfast is very good...a complete breakfast. In September, we went for a visit, but within a couple of hours, I was in ICU at the hospital. The staff at Music Capital Inn bent over backwards to be sure that my spouse had everything needed to make the time tolerable. When checking out, we realized that they had discounted our room $20...which we didn't ask for or expect. We've stayed at many of the places in Branson, but this one exceeds our expectations every time. The also provide a service to get tickets to shows, often at a discount. No complaints from us. We always recommend this hotel to our friends when they go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Always great”
Reviews.Author: TexasNana57
Reviews.Content: This is our third time to stay at this Best Western in Branson. It is perfect.....clean, comfortable, convenient location on the RED ROUTE, everyone is friendly and helpful. The king bed was very comfortable with plenty of good pillows. We brought our laptop this time and the free internet worked perfectly. A new item is the "clean remote" for the TV. It says that It is easy to clean and disinfect. I liked that because one of the first things I do, no matter how clean a hotel is, is wipe down the remote, telephone, alarm clock. We chose not to have our room cleaned while we were there for 3 nights, but we did take our garbage out and used the recycling bins in the hallway. The friendly concierge in the gift shop (iBranson Ticket Service) was able to get us some good tickets to some great shows at reasonable prices. She also helped us figure out a place to eat between shows. The ladies at the desk were friendly and helped us with getting a reservation to another Best Western in Louisiana. This hotel provides a very good breakfast with eggs, waffles, sausage (no bacon though), donuts, juice, yogurt, bananas, etc. But it can get very crowded in the breakfast room because a lot of tour buses stay here. One morning we brought our food back to the room. Even though the hotel is full, it is still very quiet. We didn't hear anyone during the nights and we both slept very well. We stayed in room 215 which is convenient to the side door to the parking lot. All in all another great stay for 3 nights at a reasonable price ($87.14 a night plus taxes). We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “A cut above”
Reviews.Author: KyColonel
Reviews.Content: First, probably last, trip to Branson. The Music Capital Inn provided comfortable lodging with friendly staffing. Staying four nights we found the beds comfortable and the complementary breakfast to be adequate. The breakfast area was fairly small given the tour bus business of the facility; coffee was always available. While we did not use the indoor pool, it appeared well kept; the Inn has a gift shop with the basics. The lobby was large enough to be comfortable while waiting daily to board our tour bus. This Best Western seems to be a cut above the many tourist facilities throughout the area and we would not hesitate to return if we should ever find ourselves in Branson again.

Reviews.Title: “Good rate, very clean rooms, good breakfast, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: nhmorris43
Reviews.Content: This was a very clean motel, had a good breakfast, and very friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: travelor371
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel! We had never stayed here before and this was the hotel our group had reservations at and we were very pleased. The staff is friendly and attentive, the rooms are clean and comfortable, the breakfast is great and kept well stocked and it is in a great location to everything yet not on a noisy road. We will definitely be staying here again when we go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: mimiof3
Reviews.Content: Love this hotel. It was off the main street but close to everything! They were very accommodating, Room was exactly what we ask for. You can purchase your tickets at the gift shop and the ladies there were very helpful. Breakfast was fine. It wasn't a gourmet meal but had about anything you could want at a free hotel breakfast. Would definitely stay there again!!!! Went with my sister in law and took my parents.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel In Branson”
Reviews.Author: Beckie F
Reviews.Content: Muisc Capital Inn is clean, the staff are friendly and go above and beyond for customer satisfaction. The location is great for everything Branson has to offer, but off the main strip (76) so you don't have to fight traffic coming and going. The fridge and microwave in every room is a definite plus.We have stayed at this hotel multiple times and have never been disappointed. I'd recommend this hotel to anyone looking for great quality and service at a great price!

Reviews.Title: “Clean”
Reviews.Author: MelodieTravels
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean. I am a clean freak and was impressed at the cleanliness of the pool area, bathrooms, and bedding. Loved the location - close to everything but off of the main strip so less traffic. The hotel seemed very quiet. There was a fridge in the room and I was amazed that it seemed perfectly silent. We did have to turn on the fan to drown out some noise from the next room but the fan seemed quiet too. The front desk staff was nice but not as helpful as in some of the other reviews that I read about this hotel. When I asked for recommendations regarding restaurants, they seemed like they were surprised that I was asking and did not have a lot to offer. The woman stocking the breakfast area in the mornings was very pleasant as were the maintenance workers. The breakfast was nice for a "cold" breakfast - breads, donuts, cereal, waffle maker, scrambled eggs, sausage, yogurt. My only complaint was that the breakfast area was small and we had to wait for a table several mornings. In the summer, my "tween" kids would prefer an outdoor pool with a slide and more activities, but for a fall retreat, it was just right. We were impressed that the hotel was tuned into a Christian radio station in the lobby and pool area.

Reviews.Title: “Not as clean as you'd expect for a Best Western”
Reviews.Author: chloebee
Reviews.Content: My family booked rooms for a 2 night stay based on the rave reviews. Not sure why everyone gave such praise. When I booked the rooms, the people I talked to were very friendly so I was pleasantly pleased. When we checked in and got to our rooms it was another story. Our bathroom had a piece of dental floss on the floor and the bathroom looked like it had only been shoddily wiped down. On the second day our beds were only made, coffee wasn't replaced nor was the old leftover wrappings of sugar thrown away replaced. My sister had spilt some sugar on the ground and when leaving brought it to the maids attention. When we came back later in the afternoon the sugar was still there so my sister had to ask for housekeeping to bring up a vacuum to her room so she could clean it up herself. Most hotels clean their rooms so when you come back in the afternoon the room is fresh and tidy. I know this hotel is not a 5 star hotel but after all the wonderful reviews I was definitely disappointed. The only positive about this hotel was the wonderful service we got from the lady in charge of the tickets for shows and that they were accommodating in making sure our rooms were together.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Connie K
Reviews.Content: Our 5 day stay at Best Western Music Capital Inn was fantastic! The location is perfect to attend any point of interest in the entire area, yet out of the mainstream hustle. The entire hotel is very clean and the rooms are spacious and the people are all very friendly and helpful. We would stay here again and again without any hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it and would recommend”
Reviews.Author: IllinoisFamilyoffour
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here with our two children on our first trip to Branson and enjoyed our stay immensely. The entire staff was extremely friendly and helpful with anything that was needed. The concierge personnel working in the gift shop were a great help with tickets and planning. The entire hotel was clean and welcoming. The breakfast was standard fare, nothing special but well presented. The Hotel is located across the street from Shoji's theatre; off the main strip and easy to find everything. No real negatives, very professional staff.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: scubanutty
Reviews.Content: Very short trip, but great service .. Arrived very late, hotel clerk very friendly that late at night Breakfast not great, but normal fare... Waffles were good

Reviews.Title: “Simply the best”
Reviews.Author: cheesycharlie
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for an extended vacation and the visit could not have been better. The staff is excellent, the facilities are wonderful, the complimentary breakfast is great-this is simply one of the best hotels we have ever stayed. No one should hesitate to stay here-you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again!”
Reviews.Author: tudyb
Reviews.Content: Great Place to stay, clean and people are so nice, the lady at the desk and breakfast area, plus the lady who helped with our tickets you could not ask for better treatment. I hope the owners appreciate them.They are why people keep coming back..

Reviews.Title: “Great Motorcoach Property”
Reviews.Author: Taunya L
Reviews.Content: We recently brought a group from Maryland to Branson for a 4 night stay and the Music Capital Inn was perfect. Easy access for the coach, during free time, the group could walk to shopping, restaurants and attractions. Staff was the best we had in years! Very clean and VERY GROUP FRIENDLY!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is so clean and the staff is so friendly every time we go there!”
Reviews.Author: cheryl61
Reviews.Content: We go to this hotel every time we stay in Branson. It is always so clean and the rooms are so comfy! The staff are so friendly and helpful. We love them there. The bathrooms are so great with a sink in the toilet area and outside the bathroom as well. The beds are so comfortable. The hotel is so clean. They have a hot breakfast every time we go. This is the place the place to stay if you go to Branson. It sits on Shepard of the Hills Expressway. Its right off the main drag. Stay here you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “The most awesome place and people--going back later this summer”
Reviews.Author: Marlene K
Reviews.Content: As I entered the lobby area to check in, it was beautiful and so clean. The people were so friendly. One of the best things was when I ask for a wake up call and got one from a person who was so friendly. It just made my day each morning. The breakfast area has anything you could possibly want, and the little lady in there was precious. Our room was spotless and I love the two lavatory areas. They were great for two ladies trying to put makeup on and do hair. We didn't get into each other's hair this way. I was so impressed when we passed the cleaning ladies in the hall and they remembered us and even what room we were in. We never encounter anyone that was not friendly and wanting to be sure our stay was plesant. I am planning a trip back to Branson later in the summer and have already told the group that we will be staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Most bang for your buck”
Reviews.Author: Cowan27
Reviews.Content: Loved the friendly staff, the breakfast, indoor pool/hot tub, room and location.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Friendly Service”
Reviews.Author: Caci0424
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with family and had a great time. We loved the fact it was one road over from the main strip, this made it much easier on traffic. We always had turndown service, empty trash, and plenty of towels when we would return which is often hard to find. The staff was great and very informative. The continental breakfast was nice more options than just cereal however get there early because the tables fill up quick. The only issue we encountered was the fact the hot tub was down and someone had an issue in the pool which we are not sure how it was rectified but we did not return. Overall a good stay and would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, the pool was the highlight”
Reviews.Author: sibeed
Reviews.Content: This is the third hotel we've stayed with in Branson. We'd stay there again. Friendly staff. They have a great indoor pool that we had primarily to ourselves. Layout was the typical Best Western layout. Free breakfast was nice (except having Fox News blaring was annoying). Sheets and towels were very clean. Hair on the bathroom floor, a toilet that ran throughout the night, a lampshade dangling, and goo on the desk were the only things against the place.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: adamnlouisiana
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on here, and thought the hotel sounded nice though a few were discouraging. When arriving, I was impressed and realized some reviews were a little exaggerated and wrong. The staff was very friendly, especially the lady that put out breakfast, and the concierge in the gift room was very helpful. The hotel was very clean, even the pool. Also, the pool was bigger than expected and the room in which it was located looked great. The game room may have dated games, but who goes to Branson for the hotel arcade games? It was in a great location and everything is easy to find nearby. The rooms are single rooms,meaning the tv, table, and beds in one room, with toilet and shower in a room near the door. Overall, the hotel was very impressive for the price, me n my roommate even got an extra night today because its so nice. Would stay anytime.

Reviews.Title: “Very satisfied with everything!”
Reviews.Author: KatMissouri
Reviews.Content: Walked in the door to a neat, clean lobby, and beautiful music playing! The nice lady at the front desk gave us a stack of Branson coupons and a map. The room was very clean, and already cooled down for us, even though they had no idea when we were coming. Plenty of room, and a sink inside and outside of the bathroom. The full breakfast saved us some money,and it was delicious! Biscuits and gravy, seasoned fried potatoes, sausage, eggs, apples, pastry and the great waffle maker! Several kinds of juice, coffee and milk. The pool stayed open until midnight, so people could enjoy a swim after the shows. Would definitely stay here again. Not the cheapest, but find the cheapest and compare to Music Capital Inn! We don't get to vacation often, and want to have a nice place to stay when we do.

Reviews.Title: “It was a nice stay overall except for Room Service”
Reviews.Author: Suelena
Reviews.Content: The Good.. Location is perfect. Off the main strip but close to everything.. easy to get in and out of and easy to get to eveything without all the traffic. Front desk help very nice and helpful. Concergie in gift shop very helpful. Free breakfast was nice for a free breakfast.. lots to choose from. My kids loved making their own waffles each morning.. good coffee. The lady who kept the dining area was very friendly and nice.. always greeted us and the guests and even visited with everyone. This hotel does have alot of nice extras, coffee available 24 hours in Lobby, wifi in rooms, indoor pool, laundry facility and a game room, even a jacuzzi which was out of order during our stay. Rooms have easy access from parking lot by a side door. Beds are very comfortable! Hotel is quite. We never heard a noise at night which is unusual! We were on the main floor and even the parking lot outside of our room was noise free. The bad... I know this is being picky but at first sight I was not impressed. The decor in lobby is outdated and not what I am use to. I have never stayed at a 2.5 star hotel before. I booked it because of the last minute trip and another hotel I wanted was booked. Tripadviser had this hotel list as #1 so we went with it. Entered room and it had a bad smell to it which hit us as soon as we opened the door.. even my kids said something about it. It was not a foul smell but just an old dusty smell to it like it had been vacant for years. After the day.. we were use to it and it did not bother us anymore.. but I will say this, we considered leaving. Went to bathroom and noticed a toothpick and some small dark curled hair on floor next to bathroom. Did not complain instead cleaned up the hair but left the toothpick. Next day when we returned it was still there. Day 3, we did not get our room serviced. It was a long day and very dissapointed to come back to unmade beds, floors dirty and no clean towels. I do understand that the staff cannot inspect every room for proper cleaning and leaves their trust in employees to their jobs right. Sorry, but these are not huge rooms so spotless is not to much to ask for! Front desk stated that the room was marked as being "cleaned!" They did give us a credit for this. One day while room service was making the rounds, the man was cleaning the room across from ours and he was in their singing and when he saw me he winked at me and kept dancing and singing while cleaning. Sorry but I thought this was strange! Hotel is nestled between 2 motels on each side which I didnt care for, but thats just me being picky about my surroundings.. the people in Branson are there to see shows and enjoy other activities and I do understand that it is not cheap to visit Branson so some may need to save money by staying at cheaper hotels/motels.. I dont think you are going to get any rift rafters in Branson so I did not end up feeling unsafe with motels around me. Best Western to me was not at all expensive and was a higher end hotel with a cheap price tag. Dont forget to ask about discounts.. we got a discount for being Sams Club members and got a nice discount. Yes, I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our Stay”
Reviews.Author: eold2412
Reviews.Content: We normally stay at another Myers family owned hotel but it was unavailable so we decided to try this Best Western. It was really nice. The rooms were clean and quiet at night. The breakfeast was good and had a nice variety. The staff was very friendly and we actually like this location a lot. .The only problem encountered was that the hot tub was down because of a heating problem. We will definately consider this hotel in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great as always”
Reviews.Author: judy0606
Reviews.Content: I hadn't stayed here in about 2 years. It was still as great as always. The rooms are always nice and clean. Beds and pillows are comfortable. Small fridge and microwave in all rooms. The location can't be beat. I have stayed here many, many times and have always been pleased with the hotel. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs up!”
Reviews.Author: kchapman500
Reviews.Content: This hotel provided a very clean room and excellent customer service. My family and I arrived at 7:30 am, well ahead of the 3 pm check in time, but the hotel clerk told me she would have a room ready for us as soon as someone checked out. I received a call that my room was ready in an hour. The entire staff was friendly and seemed to go above the call of duty when I needed directions or suggestions about the Branson area. The room was great and the price was very affordable. The location was great and with temperatures approching 100 degrees, the indoor pool was like having your cake and eatting it too. I would definelty reccommend this hotel and will stay here again when I am in the Branson area.

Reviews.Title: “Second time staying.. still great!”
Reviews.Author: mom2nick
Reviews.Content: Hubby and I took our three kids for a quick summer vacation to Branson, we had been there before about 18 months before. I didn't even look for another hotel just booked this one again. Not disappointed, room was clean and quiet (we were even on the main floor right next to the elevator and didn't hear a thing!) Anna in the gift shop is amazing, she is so helpful in getting tickets and telling you what would be suitable for your group. The kids loved the pool and arcade and the breakfast was better than most "free" ones at other hotels!

Reviews.Title: “Loved It”
Reviews.Author: kitiwake
Reviews.Content: The room was beautiful and very clean! The staff was very helpful and the breakfast was excellent and a great variety. Would stay there again. It was right across the street from the show that we went to.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again, definitely!”
Reviews.Author: tlinn2775
Reviews.Content: We needed a handicapped room with a roll in shower, which you hardly ever find in a handicap accessible room. 2 queen beds would have been better since it was me, my husband and disabled son but okay with king and a cot. Staff was very helpful to us. Wonderfull place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Branson Country Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Traveler-rs-10
Reviews.Content: From registration process to check-out, everything and everyone (hotel staff) was great! The rooms were very clean and the hotel staff did everything they could to make our stay wonderful! Hotel staff was quick to respond to all our needs (crib and fresh towels). There were a wide variety of foods on the complimentary breakfast buffett. The solo staff member tried to keep foods and condiments replenished on the buffett. We will visit this hotel again when we stay in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “We had a good time, and we will stay there again in the future!”
Reviews.Author: lucylin07
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very clean, friendly staff, helpful. Good location. Free breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “The cleanest, most quiet and very professional and efficient staff”
Reviews.Author: LAS94
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were there for worldview weekend and a couple days extra. You always wonder about some of the hotels, but we were so impressed by the staff. They went way out of their way to accommodate you and always with a smile! We will definitely stay there again, and spread the word to others that will be visiting Branson! Way to go owners and staff.

Reviews.Title: “1st time Family Vacation and had the Best time ever!!”
Reviews.Author: kkhoffman80
Reviews.Content: My family & I cannot THANK the staff at the Music Capital Inn. SO Nice & Friendly !!) What a wonderful,enjoyable time we had!! Anna Lee the gift shop lady. Thank-you, Thank-you THANK-YOU for your help in getting our tickets and the great savings you was able to get for US!! You did a fabulous job!! Thank You for breakfast was a great selection! Eggs & meats,waffles...Love your coffee Thank-you for room service..Fresh towels, Beds made ... so Nice to come back to a cool, clean picked up room!! Great pool & hot tub too! We love the easy access to get in & out of your motel location! Especially after shows. We always Enjoy our stays here AND HIGHLY suggest to others to consider this motel for your Branson vacation!! We THANK-you again GOD BLESS YOU ALL !! K&K HOFFMAN- IA

Reviews.Title: “Remarkable place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: snoopygirl137
Reviews.Content: We have traveled to Branson for several years now and have stayed in this same hotel and see ourselves coming for many more years and plan to stay at this same hotel each time ! The staff is wonderful to us and always see that we have everything we need during our stay.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels I have ever stayed at.”
Reviews.Author: smelliott23
Reviews.Content: The rooms were in excellent conditions. The service was wonderful, I could not have asked for better

Reviews.Title: “clean hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: FamOf4JCMO
Reviews.Content: clean, checkin/out was easy, nice pool area and pool side seating, breakfast was good, bed was comfy and had lots of nice soft pillows, the price was just ok b/c we have stayed at nicer hotels for less per night, perfect location for this family of four!

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: sandbari
Reviews.Content: Homestyle motel on the northwest side of Branson, directly across the street from the Shoji Tabuchi theater. The outside looks much better in person than the photo. Even though it was booked solid, my room was quiet. Superb value. Double-digit price included an indoor pool, microwave & fridge, coffee maker, free hot breakfast, large room with high ceilings, and a second sink area outside of the main bathroom. Decor is like staying at your grandparents but everything is nice and clean, very comfortable. Bed felt just like my 15-year-old mattress at home (could be a plus or minus; I liked it). The gift shop saved me a trip to buy a greeting card. I traveled with a senior citizen who doesn't care about fancy, just comfort, and he was extremely satisfied--plenty of space for medical equipment, free breakfast, rooms not far from the parking lot, and for a price that even he thought was reasonable. The only thing I wished for were more electrical outlets, particularly by the nightstand. Also, the furniture does vary from room to room, and some rooms look nicer than others (but they are all clean). Very satisfied and would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL, JUST KEEPS GETTING BETTER”
Reviews.Author: joplinite
Reviews.Content: We always stay at the Best Western Music Capital Inn when we are in Branson. They have an outstanding staff, clean and comfortable rooms and a very nice continental breakfast. We were pleasantly surprised when we discovered they are adding new furniture and decorations to their guest rooms. They have expanded their breakfast bar and they make special provisions when they have large groups of young people staying with them so they do not distrube other guests. I think this Hotel goes out of it's way to accomodate everyone. We're looking forward to our next trip to Branson and our next stay at the Best Western Music Capital Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Still a good value”
Reviews.Author: JMSDOC
Reviews.Content: Nestled away from most of the congestion in Branson yet close enough to many of the major attractions this hotel offers a lot of value. The staff was extremely courteous and friendly, the room was great, and parking was close to the building and free. The breakfast area is still a little crowded at times but it is free. My best advice is get there a little early before the crowd.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: burnettes4
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great for our girls trip of mom, grandma, and two 12 year old girls! We appreciated the two separate vanities and microwave in the room. The breakfast was very good each morning, hot and lots of variety. The salt water pool, hot tub, and sauna provided great entertainment every evening for the girls. It was very clean and well kept. We will definitely return to this hotel on our next trip to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: ginnylou
Reviews.Content: We stayed here recently on a vacation, we were very pleased with this hotel. The room was super clean, the location is perfect, not on the strip, but right off. The breakfast was super great, eggs, sausage, biscuits, sausage gravy, waffles, donuts, oatmeal, cereal and fresh fruit, plus milk, coffee, apple and orange juice. The pool was great also, heated salt water pool and a hot tub nearby. You cannot go wrong with this hotel, will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful, friendly, clean, comfortable -- great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: girlchief
Reviews.Content: General Manager Sue Gordy and staff are fantastic -- you feel like you are visiting friends. Everyone was very helpful, friendly, knowledgeable, energetic, and positive. Recommendations offered for great places to eat, shop, and shows to see where right on the mark!

Reviews.Title: “I Will GO Back Again and Again”
Reviews.Author: susankidd
Reviews.Content: Best Western Music Capital Inn is the only hotel I will stay at when I am in Branson, MO. I am in Branson at least once every three months. I have stayed with my Youth Group as well as just with family. The scenerio is always the same - great service, addressed by name, clean, comfortable rooms, great breakfast room. They have an indoor pool that is now salt water, which is healthier for your skin, hair and eyes. No more harsh chemical smells. The staff is always right on top of things regardless of the need. I recommend this hotel to everyone I know that goes to Branson. It is conveniently located on Shepard of the Hills Expressway, a few blocks from Red Lobster, Imax movie theater, Golden Corral, and IHOP ampng many other great places. The malls are only a few miles away - very close and easy to find. So next time you're in Branson, MO., do yourself a favor and stay at the Best Western Music Capital Inn. You will be so glad you did.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel experience!”
Reviews.Author: Ammy36
Reviews.Content: Clean. Quiet--even though on the Red Route. Outstanding breakfast. Free hot beverages always available. Comfortable beds. Especially liked the bathroom with separated second vanity/sink--and the tub/shower was GREAT!

Reviews.Title: “Have a wonderful free breakfast after a great night's sleep in a friendly atmosphere!”
Reviews.Author: Janski85
Reviews.Content: Excellent, friendly, personal service from all levels at this hotel. The room has no smell (not even that stale hotel room smell). The bathrooms look new--high water pressure with fast hot water and a second sink outside the full bathroom as well. The A/C room air unit kept itself exactly where it was set-- no hot and cold flashes during the night. The FULL breakfast was like none I've ever seen. No simple Continental fare here. Speedy wireless connection too. Plenty of parking and easy to get on and off the Strip.

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: Lynn244
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The front desk staff is extremely friendly and helpful.Our room was clean. We liked the idea of an open Bible on the dresser when we arrived.Breakfast was good. We stayed for four nights and would come back again.This is a great town.We would love to come back sometime. This hotel is located across from Shoji theater ,we were told that it was the best show in town. In our opinion-it was our least favorite. We saw 13 shows, all were great. We thought Six and Clay Cooper were by far the best !!

Reviews.Title: “Life Saver!”
Reviews.Author: DJs12904
Reviews.Content: This best western is the "BEST" in branson. The pool is salt water not chlorine, and after working 70 plus hour weeks a mini vacation with my son is just what I need to relax and have fun. I'm impressed at just how clean the hotel is. This year I almost wrote off going anywhere due to the bed bug scare, but I haven't seen "any reasons" for such concern with any of the best westerns in branson. Thank you so much for making our stay comfortable, worry free, and FUN!

Reviews.Title: “Best Of The Best”
Reviews.Author: dodger069
Reviews.Content: i am a travel agent and could stay in almost any hotel at a discount.I choose this one and will recommend it to anyone who needs a place in Branson.The rooms are spacious,staff will help you anyway they can,location is great,a few minutes from any place in Branson.Across the street from Shoji ,the best show in Branson.The hotel gets a A in cleanliness.It really made my first stay in Branson a vacation to remember

Reviews.Title: “Great place, greater people.”
Reviews.Author: barry1951
Reviews.Content: Very friendly and helpful staff, clean, nice rooms, indoor pool, great hot breakfast with eggs and sausage. Close to strip and restaurants. Greatvalue.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with great staff!”
Reviews.Author: Asil83
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with my dad and niece. We left the Quality Inn next door and we were hoping to find out that they had a cancellation here. They had one room left, but it was the room they hold in case a guest has a problem with their room. After we told the manager why we left the hotel next door, she gave us the hold room. The staff also allowed us to look at the room before booking so we knew if we were happy with it. We had a great room that was very comfortable. There's a pool, a hot tub, a sauna, and a game room. There is also a nice little gift shop. Good breakfast in the morning, too, and it was free. Location was great, service was great. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “To sum it up.. very average or slightly below average hotel.”
Reviews.Author: cjrdh13
Reviews.Content: I personally would not stay at this hotel again. I have stayed at many other chains in the past, and this was personally one of the more basic hotels I have ever stayed in. My main objective was that the hotel itself is somewhat old, however, many of the hotels in Branson are older hotels... We stayed here for 2 nights, and the bed was very hard and low to the ground. They did have a continental breakfast that consisted of EggBeaters, cold biscuits, watered down gravy, make your own waffles, and there was some donuts, dry cereals, and yogurts as well. I would recommend getting up early and having breakfast at some of the breakfast buffets in town.. read reviews to find a good one. The staff was helpful and nice. The hotel itself did have a funky smell, but it was okay for the two nights we were there I suppose. The last night we stayed at the Chateau on the Lake- if you can afford this for the entire length of stay and book early you can probably get a good deal- definately will be staying here or at another more upscale hotel on our next visit to branson. Hope this review helps!:)

Reviews.Title: “Nicest people in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: cejce
Reviews.Content: Our family goes to Branson,MO usually in the Spring and then again in late Summer or Early Fall. We have never had a bad experience here! The staff is ALWAYS friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean, quiet, and nicely decorated. The "continental" breakfast is exceptional! The first time we stayed, I was expecting juice and stale donuts, but I was PLEASANTLY surprised! There is no reason to spend extra money for breakfast when you have such a good variety! The pool area is always refreshing and well maintained. We WOULDN'T stay anywhere else while in Branson! We highly recommend this Best Western!

Reviews.Title: “Close your eyes and hold your nose.”
Reviews.Author: JenniferM888
Reviews.Content: The staff was great. That is the ONE positive I can say. Our bathroom had not been cleaned. There was evidence in the toilet. GROSS. It had one of those band that gave the illusion that it had been cleaned....again, so gross. Sink was dirty in bathroom. hair. Slept fine. Breakfast.....pink donut had a small,but VERY visible Japanese Beetle imbedded in it. How could the attendant NOT have seen that when she added new donuts????? We got out of there as fast as we could.

Reviews.Title: “The Best in Branson”
Reviews.Author: old_retired
Reviews.Content: The Best Western Music Capital Inn is the only place we will stay in Branson. The employees go out of their way to make sure that we have everything we need and that we are comfortable. The rooms are quiet, no noise from the halls or other rooms, and the beds are very comfortable. The cleaning staff are great and our room was perfect every day. We have stayed in motels around the country and this is the only one we stay in consistently. This year we even passes on the offer of a condo just to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Only place I want to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: momvici
Reviews.Content: I love this hotel not only because the staff is wonderful and the rooms are nice at a decent rate, but the location is the best! It is off the main strip, but near enough for fast access. It is much easier to get out on the road because it is away from the crazy traffic! My kids love the game room, but most importantly the ice cream vending machine! Also a wonderful gift shop and helpful people that work in there and are great for getting your tickets at the best rates available!

Reviews.Title: “Made the right choice for our 3 day stay in Branson.”
Reviews.Author: eblowe
Reviews.Content: We were completely satisfied with our stay at this Hotel. The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. The rooms were completely satisfactory. It turned out to be very conveniently located off the overly busy main street. Had no problem getting to and from shows - the staff helped greatly by giving us tips. Looking forward to returning on our next visit to Branson. We were on our way back to Florida after a 30 day driving vacation: we can say that this Hotel was one of the most enjoyable, if not the best we stayed in.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and helpful staff that was very knowledgable about the area.”
Reviews.Author: happytravelers44
Reviews.Content: Execelent service. Staff was always willing to find an answer to our question. We needed a pharmacy late in the evening and the staff called until they found one that was open. The location was great. Directly across from one of the shows we wanted to see and away from the most conjested part of the city. Perfect for us. Guest services. They could tell us about all the entertainment in the area. We just let them know what we wanted to see and they made reservations for us. It was great! Continental breakfast space was always crowded. Hard to get in and out of parking spaces.

Reviews.Title: “great atmosphere, bed, room, staff, pool.”
Reviews.Author: Duesters
Reviews.Content: very nice place. The soothing music on sign in (Third Day), welcoming book on entering the room opened to Psalms, cleanliness, great bed and bathroom combined for a nice stay. Well priced and good location. Nice pool and hot tub.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quiet, & Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: sasnak_zo
Reviews.Content: Impressed by the Desk staff upon check in, very friendly, explained the amenities and services provided. Gift shop ticket service is great, time saver and Anna Lee is a hoot! Super personable. Room was extremely clean. The towel animal and mints on the bed was a nice touch, made you feel like you were in an upscale type hotel. Breakfast was alright, need to add sausage with those eggs. Maybe I missed them. Will stay with them again. Good locations, not on the busy strip, but close to area interests.

Reviews.Title: “MOST WONDERFUL HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: vacationerjulie
Reviews.Content: The rooms were so clean and fresh. We were so relaxed .The attendents were very helpful . My husband said it was so convenient to everything we wanted to do. We'll be staying there again on our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was fantastic.”
Reviews.Author: delajust
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very easy to find. Has great access to main road and all attractions. The room was very clean and the beds were so comfortable. The hotel staff always greeted us and was very attentive to any of our needs. They also gave us access to purchase tickets and provided some terrific advise on what to see. The breakfast has such a great selection which was a huge money saver when you have a teenage boy that never stops eating!

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't have made a better choice”
Reviews.Author: svladysadie
Reviews.Content: This hotel was nearly perfect in every way. The room was excellent and clean, with everything functioning as you'd want. The staff was all very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was very good. The location was great. The bargain we got at this website was just an extra bonus. Stay here and look closely at a local map. The back roads will avoid almost all of the terrible Branson traffic on the way to and from most shows and shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Good Location, Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: royalmay
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for the state baseball tournament held in Branson. The hotel is very clean and accomodating. The desk staff was welcoming, polite, and very helpful and courteous at all times (especally given the number of 10 yr old ball players staying at the hotel). Strong wirelss WiFi throughout the property was a plus. The boys enjoyed the pool and hot tub on many occasions. Our room was clean and spacious. Amenities on premises were as described. Property is near all attractions and the Branson RecPlex. Only issues to be aware of is breakfast is limited in selections, the donuts and waffles were good, but skip the cold biscuits and tasteless gravy. The ice machine on the 3rd floor wasn't always working, but the one on the first floor was. Overall a nice place to stay with a very friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Everything was great.”
Reviews.Author: debsue_10
Reviews.Content: Rooms were very clean . The kids enjoyed having the pool oopen until midnightl It was a great place to bring your family..

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet, comfortable, and convenient. No WiFi in rooms though.”
Reviews.Author: LittleRock_AR_Travel
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this hotel. It was clean, quiet, and comfortable. I also like that it isn't on the main strip. It is very easy to zip around to all the important sites using the alternate red and blue routes. The room not having WiFi did not bother me until I arrived. I had planned to use my iPhone. I didn't expect AT&T not to have 3G service in Branson. I struggled to get any kind of mobile service near the hotel. So long as you aren't worried about having internet access this is a great hotel. Even without internet access it will be my new hotel of choice in Branson. If they begin providing in-room WiFi I'd bump my score to 5/5.

Reviews.Title: “Management was wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: Dreamin65583
Reviews.Content: We reserved rooms for a large group of people. The management made every attempt to ensure we were all together. They were always friendly and courteous. Sue and Michael were very helpful to us even when we had to make changes and worked with us. We appreciate how well we were treated!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: zabler
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews I decided this would be the best place to stay in Branson. Overall it was an average hotel. I don't know why this is rated the #1 place to stay. It's nice but It was a basic hotel. It made me wonder what the other hotels were like. The front reception people were nice and one man in particular was helpful when we asked for dining suggestions, the other people at the front didn't offer any great suggestions in fact they didn't even seem to know the restaurants in the area very well. We were placed in a wheelchair accessible room which we didn't mind since the room was larger and had a King size bed. It was clean. The breakfast was okay although it had horrible mushy already made oatmeal. I felt like I was eating baby food. The pool was decent 5' max deep and it had a hot tub that had peeling paint when you sat down. Overall we stayed six nights and had no complaints. As far as location is concerned unless you were going to the Shoji Theater there was very little to see in the vicinity, some ice cream place a couple other hotels and a miniature golf place that is a decent walk to get to.

Reviews.Title: “People, PLEASE...It's a Motel.”
Reviews.Author: 1JillyMac
Reviews.Content: We were traveling to Branson for a wedding weekend. We had the points to be able to stay at this hotel, or for a couple thousand more points, we could have stayed at a "higher star" hotel. I have trusted TripAdvisor reviews to get me through South Asia and Europe, and so when I saw that Best Western was ranked #1, I gambled on TripAdvisor's reviews. I WISH we would have just trusted our instincts--Best Western? #1? hmmm... This is an average MOTEL. It was clean, but the reviews people have given it are so generous it's laughable. Please, people. If you have the money...or the points, as in our case, stay at a nicer hotel. This place was just a dumpy Best Western, not unlike any other motel you could find.

Reviews.Title: “WOW! Treated like family”
Reviews.Author: roomchecker
Reviews.Content: I don't know where to start. I was blown away by the quality of this motel, and the staff. We had stayed at another Bestwestern in the area, but the experience was not as anticipated. After 1 night at the other location, we chose this location for the other 3 nights of our stay. The transition was very smooth, and the staff was very helpful. We were able to get a room 2 doors down from the indoor pool. I have never seen such energy and such service from any motel staff. Not just 1 stood out, but they all did. They made you feel like they have known you forever. Always willing to answer any questions, and help when they could. The breakfast was exceptional, with hot and could items. This location was even cheaper than the other. All ameneties are in 1 building, and 100% smoke free building. I could keep going on, but won't. I know the next time we go to Branson, we will definitely will be staying here. For a experience worth remembering, stay here

Reviews.Title: “Best Place to Stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Skip0
Reviews.Content: I am a frequent visitor to Branson, and have been so for over twenty years, making 5-10 trips per year, as I live only 4 hours away. Over the years, I have tried many different hotels in Branson. Some have been bad, and some have been good. "Value" is the word here. When you consider the high quality of the room, an indoor pool and sauna, game room, and laundry facilities, Music capital Inn is a value. Add to that the security of the indoor access to rooms along with a key just to enter the building, your family's safety and security is unmatched. Onsite ticket sales to the shows and attractions in Branson save you valuable time and money. And last, the staff is as friendly as I have ever seen. They go out of their way to accomodate your needs and wants.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: virgotroy
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay.Clean rooms, friendly employees.Every one very helpful.Great location.I like the free breakfast. I like being able to book shows with the concierge.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel as usual!”
Reviews.Author: luvtocamp2
Reviews.Content: Our family has stayed in this hotel numerous times. The breakfast is great - plenty of food. Our rooms were wonderful. The staff is great and very accomadating. We will be staying here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Lindhy
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel a couple of times before. It has been consistently immaculate, which is always my first concern. The staff seems to stay the same, and they remembered us from prior visits. It's like going back to visit old friends. There seems to be a lot of pride in how everything looks.

Reviews.Title: “Courteous and Very Clean”
Reviews.Author: Jolie6350
Reviews.Content: Front Desk Clerks were very friendly and helpful. The room was clean, neat and very comfortable. We have stayed there in the past. Easy to get to and nice to be away from all the hustle and bustle. Will probably stay there again. The breakfast area could be bigger. The breakfast served was adequate. Could have a little more variety. Also the breakfast staff could have been more alert when items ran out.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: dmerle
Reviews.Content: The Indoor Pool and Spa are very first class. The King Suites are very very nice. The Staff is very friendly and helpful. The Breakfast was great.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Grandparent56
Reviews.Content: We visit Branson once or twice a year and always stay at this hotel if possible. The staff is wonderful - very helpful and friendly. The indoor swimming pool is always great. We usually meet other family members when we go and the hotel staff works with us to get us rooms adjoining or directly across the hall. This is very important with all of our young grandchildren because they like to visit back and forth between the rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful location and great service at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Tallinxxx
Reviews.Content: This was our second time staying at this hotel in Branson. My kids loved the indoor pool that came in handy when the first weekend of Spring came with 33 degree weather and rain. The rooms were clean and the hotel staff was very helpful and pleasent. We had a wonderful stay here and will most likely always stay here when we come to Branson as it is rare to find this quality at such a good rate.

Reviews.Title: “Clean with outstanding service!”
Reviews.Author: mdv057
Reviews.Content: We were just staying overnight in Branson and found this hotel on the web. I called to make the reservations and the lady on the phone was very helpful and nice. I really didn't know what to expect from this hotel but was very pleased once we arrived. The hotel rooms are pretty large and very clean. It is no 5 star hotel because of course it is a Best Western.... but it was perfect for the price and most importantly to us... it was super CLEAN! The free breakfast the next morning hit the spot and the checkout person was just adorable. I couldn't believe how friendly everyone was. I will always stay at this hotel when returning to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel if it isn't too crowded, especially for families.”
Reviews.Author: FamilyVacationsMN
Reviews.Content: We stayed here four nights in late December 2009. The first two nights were great, then the second two were not as great. After the second day, two giant buses pulled in loaded with people, and those people took over the place, especially the breakfast area. They acted as if they owned the place and that they were the only guests. So for those two mornings we had to make alternative plans for breakfast. The breakfast area was well over capacity with everyone just sitting around "having coffee" and taking up all the tables. The first two nights were great though. The rooms are decent with comfortable beds and nice pillows. They have flat screen TV's (but not very many channels to choose from.... no Disney channel so my daughters were disappointing by that). The pool area was nice and had an indoor/outdoor pool. There is plenty of on-site parking, and the hotel is in a nice location for everything you need to do in Branson.
