The workers were friendly, and 3 of the 4 people we dealt with at the front desk were very polite and helpful. They offer discount show tickets right at the front deck, so that was a convenient way to buy our show tickets, and have them charged to the room. Breakfast the first two night was pretty good, and offered biscuits and gravy, eggs, and you can make waffles. Not as good as what you get at a Drury though, if you are familiar with Drury Inns (we stayed at a Drury in Kansas City before and after our Branson stay, and the Drury was much nicer in our opinion than this Best Western). In conclusion, we did like this property, but if the whole time had been like the last two days, we probably would not recommend it. As it is, I'll click on recommend, thought next to Branson, I'll likely look for a rental property instead of a chain hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel, perfect location, great for families with children and super value for the money”
Reviews.Author: Oceans15
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel!!!! The location, amenities, cleanliness and price make this an incredible place to stay. We travel to Branson with our children twice a year to visit Silver Dollar City, and always stay at the Best Western Music Capital Inn. 1) The location is perfect! Only a few miles to Silver Dollar City, and it's right off Highway 465 so getting there is quite convenient, allowing you to avoid all of the Highway 76 traffic through downtown Branson. There are numerous dining options in this area, as well as many show options, too. 2) The amenities at this hotel are great for the price!!!! The indoor pool and hot tub area is beautifully designed with an open forum - surrounded by all windows so it's a pleasant area to spend time with your family. There is also a workout room, and small game room. The hotel offers a fantastic free HOT breakfast every morning complete with eggs, biscuits and gravy, waffles, oatmeal, assorted danishes, cereals, yogurt, coffee and juices. 3) We have visited this hotel many times over the past couple of years, and it is ALWAYS clean and tidy. And the staff has always been MORE than accomodating and friendly. 4) With all it has to offer, this hotel is a great value for the price. We highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: QuadCitiesBikerMama
Reviews.Content: The hotel is well located, close to attractions and dining but just off the 'strip'. The rooms are nice, clean, and comfortable. Check in/check out is easy and friendly. The breakfast was very good and attractively presented. This was the second time we stayed at this hotel and will stay there again when we are in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “BW Music Capital Inn Great 2 star hotel stay”
Reviews.Author: hoodoos
Reviews.Content: Small family stay on Thanksgiving. Best Western Music capital Inn is older property in very well cared for condition. Mid priced hotel, good value. The owners have taken care to keep rooms and common areas in happy status. Rooms have good beds, extras in room, fast free wifi. Good hot breakfast every AM with musical guests who dropped by to pitch their show-what fun! Excellent restaurant cross street - Paradise Steakhouse and Grill. On less traveled street, not jammed with traffic as others were. Shoji Tabuchi Show across street. Placed on fairly steep hill, so may have access issues for some. Will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Clean with Lots of Small Touches that Add to Your Experience”
Reviews.Author: coloradorudy
Reviews.Content: Our rooms were tastefully decorated and very clean with microwaves, refrigerator, ironing equipment, special makeup mirror, double sinks, pulsating shower. We were an older Mother and Daughter with another family that had young children. We had adjoining rooms which were convenient and lended well to our visiting. We were always greeted with friendly hellos at the front desk. The ticket tour concierge was nice about looking up information for me about a tour that did not need early ticket purchase. So even though there was no benefit to her, she assisted in the most kind and friendly way. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and had a great visit. A special touch was that they put a special welcome message on the outdoor sign welcoming me and my family.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay. All employees very friendly and helpfu.”
Reviews.Author: PeteParkHillOk
Reviews.Content: A wonderful place to stay. Always very friendly and very clean and quite. Good location in the city.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: cpprn
Reviews.Content: Friendliest staff, we had to reschedule are trip due to a death in the church group we were traveling with and the staff was so easy to work with and made the re-arranging a pleasant experience. The hotel was very clean and the breakfast was wonderful! Thank you for a relaxing, delightful experience

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL-GREAT LOCATION-REALLY NICE PEOPLE”
Reviews.Author: momomluv2go
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Branson since the early '90's. We were also going with my inlaws, so I researched our hotel quite a bit on trip advisor. My inlaws did not want to spend a lot, but since we have 2 sons, ages 7 and 11, we needed an indoor pool. We also needed a refrigerator in the room. The hotel staff is so nice, even changing my inlaws' room at check in to include a fridge in their room. The pool, hot tub and sauna are awesome! The entire hotel is very clean! Our beds were fine, not the best we have had, but we all slept well. The bathroom was very clean, which is great. The breakfast was standard and we all ate their every morning. The location is great, because it is not on the exact strip which can be way too busy. It is one street over, but still in a very active part of town. Branson is great, we were certainly surprised at how much there is to do!!!

Reviews.Title: “YES”
Reviews.Author: Violet52
Reviews.Content: I thought that this hotel would not be the best because it was not expensive. I took a chance on it! I would send friends and family without hesitation to this property because I liked the employees, the location and the cleanliness of the place. The hot breakfast was plentiful. It included scrambled eggs, biscuits and gravy, waffles, fresh fruit, donuts, bagels, cereal, coffee and juice. The first day, we had a swan (made out of towels) on our bed! It was an amazing place and deserves this recommendation!.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to Vacation in Branson”
Reviews.Author: sensitive27
Reviews.Content: We stopped in to check the room rates as we were going to be staying for three nights. The lady at the front desk was so very nice and friendly. She was very accomodating and made us feel like we would want to stay there. She even called over to the other Best Western motel to see if they had smoking rooms, since Best Western Music Capital Inn was 100% smoke free. But, in the end we decided to stay here instead and we are very happy we did. We had excellent access to our room, wonderful parking, and best of all No Noise. I am a very light sleeper and the noise from room doors closing, ect. is very hard to deal with when you are trying to sleep.The rooms were great, the bed was very comfortable as well at the pillows. The sheets were also very elegant. I loved the heat lamp in the bathroom and the area outside of the bathroom with a sink and mirrors. The lady in the gift shop was excellent in getting us tickets with great seats to 3 shows we wanted to see. She was very friendly and very helpful. That was the first time we got our show tickets like this. I will definitely get our show tickets the same way from now on. The breakfast was very good also, it was a hot breakfast with many items to choose from, along with the basic breakfast foods, such as cereal, etc. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Well worth the money!”
Reviews.Author: mom2nick
Reviews.Content: We just got back from a 3 day Branson Vacation and we are so glad we chose this hotel. The rooms were very nice, altho my son did find an opened chocolate bar under the bed.. that was the only negative about the whole stay. The pool was nice, the breakfast was fresh, the concierge was extremely helpful with planning shows and told it like it was if she didn't recommend someplace. She also called and got us discounted tickets for a show. We will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “would definitely stay here again”
Reviews.Author: HollyMollyB
Reviews.Content: We understand why this hotel is ranked as #1 on Tripadvisor out of 148 hotels in 2009, that distinction is well-deserved! The hotel staff were all so friendly and helpful; they were very accomodating with regard to special requests (in our case, room location) and knowledgable about activities around town. Check-in and out were both fast. The room was extremely clean and he "towel swan" with mints on the bed a very nice touch! The vanity sink located outside the bathroom is definitely convenient. Breakfast was good, with the standards (eggs, meats, biscuits, bagels, toast, etc) as well as juices, yogurt, cereals, make-your-own waffles and so on. The hotel location is perfect, right across the street from the Shoji theatre, a block or two from the IMAX, and a short drive to the outlet malls and the main "strip" with other show venues. Only one minor comment: both pool and exercise room don't open until relatively late, at 9am. However, we're early risers and prefer to get our workouts done between 5am-6am. We could have asked at the front desk if they'd make an exception and allow an earlier use of the exercise room but in the end, we did not: the weather was nice, we just did power-walks around town. In any case, we would definitely stay here again on our next Branson visit.

Reviews.Title: “Can't imagine a better place to stay”
Reviews.Author: TexasNana57
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Best Western Music Capital Inn last week for 3 nights. We were able to use a 15% off coupon from interstatetravelbuddy.com. Being our first trip to Branson, we were unsure if it was a good location, but it turned out to be great....easy to get to any destination. The staff was friendly, cheerful and very helpful. The building was nice and clean. There is a large indoor pool, but we did not use it. The room was clean and the bed comfortable, with lots of pillows. We liked the bathroom arrangement with another sink outside the bathroom. Our last day we decided on another show that we wanted to see and the lady in the gift shop got us tickets on the 1st row. She, like everyone else, was very friendly and eager to help. We chose to not have our room cleaned, but the cleaning lady was pleasant when we switched out towels with her. The breakfast was good with a wide assortment....just wished that they would have had some bacon. Anyway, if we ever go back to Branson again, we will definitely stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay - will stay there again next time.”
Reviews.Author: musicmomof6
Reviews.Content: This place is number 1 in Branson for a reason. We checked out of another motel that just wasn't up to par, and checked into this one. The staff was exceptional, the building is lovely and looks new, even though it isn't. We enjoyed the pool, hot tub, gift shop,and breakfast room.They found us tickets for wonderful seats at the shows we wanted. When our car battery was dead, from forgetting to unplug our travel cooler, they even had a battery charger, and got us going. I just can't sing enough praises for this place, and we will definitely stay here again when we come to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Wow, What A Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: BEETEEKC
Reviews.Content: The staff goes above and beyond to make your stay go with out a "hitch". Clean rooms, great staff and located on a major street that makes acess to the "RED, BLUE AND YELLOW" Routes simple and easy to get around at Showtime. BEE & DEE KC,MO

Reviews.Title: “one of the best places we stay in on our 5 week adventure...”
Reviews.Author: jogolfer
Reviews.Content: The service was superb at this hotel, the staff was very helpful in getting us tickets to the show's that we wanted to see while in Branson. the whole staff was very friendly, the breakfast was good, the room comfortable and the owners of the hotel pray for all their guests...Pretty cool!! Would definitely stay there again...

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: harvey162938
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at this hotel for for at least 15 years. We rent at least 10 or more rooms for extended family. They have always been a joy to work with.They really do exceed your expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected - exceeded expectations”
Reviews.Author: VicBobCrestHill_IL
Reviews.Content: The Best Western Music Capital Inn was one of our best experiences. We have used the recommendation of Trip Advisor on many of our trips and we travel often to places we have never visited. We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights. I called the hotel to make the reservation and they gave me the internet lower daily cost with no problem. They had the King bed room available for our stay. The hotel front desk answers the phone with "how can I exceed your expectations" which they most certainly did. Their gift shop has a concierge for booking shows in Branson. I had developed my list of seven different shows, times and dates which they took over the phone and then confirmed in writing. All show seats were in the 3rd through 8th row center. The check in process was smooth including having our King bed room; maps of Branson, and having the show vouchers in an envelope. The conceige also offered recommendations where and when to eat based on the times and places of the shows. The room was very clean. The bed was comfortable with many pillows; the window opened for fresh air and the hotel is smoke free. The linens were always replaced as we requested. A coffee pot and coffee was in the room daily. The ice machines were on two of the floors and working properly. The breakfast was acceptable and manned by an employee. Each morning various entertainers came into the room and promoted their show and sang at least one song. Hotel check out process was accurate and easy at the desk. The hotel is across the street from Shoji Tabuchi Show and one door down from Pierce Arrow Theatre. It's location was excellent. All employees greeted us with smiles. It was all we needed and wanted and more. They did exceed our expectations!

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely Recommend this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: elegan
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a trip to Branson and stayed for 6 nights. Front Desk was very accomodating with help for directions, and recommendations for restaurants/shows. The morning Breakfast was plentiful. The location was convenient to shows yet not in a congested or heavily traveled area. Room was clean. If I returned to Branson would probably stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable, friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: slcia
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Good location without a lot of traffic in area.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Babo59
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a very pleasant surprise. Loved the location, not as hectic as other roads. Service and hotel staff were excellent, pleasant and very helpful. Rooms were good sized, bathroom setup with outside sink was terrific. Everything was clean. Price is very good too. Stayed 4 nights, on problems at all.

Reviews.Title: “A Near Perfect Hotel”
Reviews.Author: VaTraveler46
Reviews.Content: We just returned from four days at this hotel, and it was one of the best hotel experiences I have had. I just really have nothing but good to say. The front desk employees were extremely helpful in giving us restaurant ideas. We came with a group of eight, all on our first trip to Branson, and had no reservations for any shows. We ended up seeing eight shows in 3 1/2 days, and Anna Lee in the gift/ticket shop gave excellent recommendations and got us great seats, even at the last minute. The location was excellent, the price was reasonable, and the room was perfect and spotless. Even the Internet connection was better than average. I cannot imagine a better hotel for a visit to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: deskclerk102
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night passing through Branson and were glad we had made this choice. The hotel was very nice and the staff are absolutely excellent. Check-in was super fast and friendly. There is also a ticket office on-site to help with show tickets, which was great. The hotel is spotless and the room was very nice as well (complete with a towel swan on the bed:-) There is a very nice indoor pool/hot tub and breakfast in the morning was better than the usual fare, complete with waffle iron. The location was great too...on Shepherd of the Hills, right across from Shoji and about two doors down from Pierce Arrow. Strong WiFi in the rooms as well. I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “The absolute best in Branson!!!”
Reviews.Author: ontheroadgang
Reviews.Content: We go to Branson two or three times per year and have stayed in several places. We were so pleased with this motel that we will never stay anywhere else. The staff is extremely helpful and friendly, the entire motel is very clean and quite and the rates are superb. We sent our nephew and his bride there recently for their honeymoon and they were very pleased also. It is very close to the main entertainment "strip" so easily accesses all parts of Branson. We will be returning very soon.

Reviews.Title: “Great Time”
Reviews.Author: dogandme
Reviews.Content: Very nice place, clean, friendly, good service, very good location, close to everything, easy in and out.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Western Music Capital Inn is very comfortable and makes you feel at home.”
Reviews.Author: joplinite
Reviews.Content: My husband & I spent a couple of days in Branson and stayed at the Best Western Music Capital Inn. Couldn't find a nicer place to stay regardless of the price. The rooms are clean, all the staff was very friendly and helpful and the location is great. They really make you feel at home there and want you to come back. I know that's where I want to stay on our next trip to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Best Western Hotel was a great stay.”
Reviews.Author: MissouriSherry
Reviews.Content: Everything was great. Room was clean. Good free breakfast. The kids loved the bagels. I loved the fresh waffles. The hotel has a gift shop with awesome sales people to help you purchase show tickets. The salespeople went out of their way to make our vacation fun and successful. I definately recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay They treat us like Family!”
Reviews.Author: YellowdogArkansas
Reviews.Content: I love to stay at the Best Western Music Capital Inn, We take our grandchildren 2 times a year and they are so nice to us. The breakfast is very good and the pool area is very nice. They always want to please us and we love it. We usually get their shop until you drop special and catch some Christmas shows and shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: kiddo708
Reviews.Content: We stay here every time we come to Branson. Brenda and Sue are the best! They will go above and beyond their jobs to make sure your stay is wonderful. We stayed with our 3 month old and he slept great. The hotel is very quiet and clean. The location is great as well but we stay for the service that you receive from all of the staff. We cannot wait to go again next year!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: hugomomo
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights at this hotel. We chose it due to the reviews on Tripadvisor.com. We were extremely pleased. The hotel was immaculate including the indoor pool area and restrooms off the pool. This was important was we had our two children with us so the swimming pool is a big deal! Excellent continental breakfast each morning. The only issue we had was that our room was not cleaned one morning. We think this was just a mix up due to a Do Not Disturb sign being on the door earlier that morning. The hotel was apologetic and quickly brought fresh towels. I definitely recommend this hotel and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Memories Made”
Reviews.Author: GG37
Reviews.Content: Just returned home from a wonderful weekend trip with my grown grandaughters and teenage great-grandaughter. We had a wonderful time and the main part of the trip was a really nice place to stay. All of the employees were so kind and helpful and made us feel completely comfortable. The rooms are beautiful and well maintained and always clean. We have been staying at this hotel for many years and plan on staying there again and again. We all especially enjoy the beautiful in-door pool and excersize room. Over the years we have made some wonderful memories there and hope to make many more.

Reviews.Title: “I wish all hotels were this great!”
Reviews.Author: MoogieWick
Reviews.Content: Friendly staff, super clean room, quiet, safe, good location, nice pool and the breakfast room was kept clean and they had a nice variety of breakfast food to choose from.

Reviews.Title: “This was the very best hotel we stayed at our entire trip.”
Reviews.Author: KansasJosie
Reviews.Content: We stayed at a different hotel every night during our 8 day vaction. This hotel was by far the cleanest, friendliest, and the best value. We have stayed at this hotel many times and have never beem dissapointed. Our room had a microwave and refrigerator. At one hotel we paid twice the price and while it was nice it didn't have two (one inside the bathroom and one outside) which we really like. The pool, hot tub, and sauna were very clean. You could not ask for a better breakfast bar (lots of variety). This hotel should be a 3 or 4 star rated instead of the 2 rating according to AAA. Try it I know that you will like it as much as we do.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Clean place to stay”
Reviews.Author: luv2visitfamily
Reviews.Content: The employees at this hotel are awsome. They are always friendly and personable. And are great at remembering your name and which room you're in. Our room was cleaned everyday. We have a toddler who loves to make messes. The housekeeping staff always had our room spotless when we returned. The manager of this hotel is Sue. On the 2nd day of our stay, while eating breakfast at the hotel, she came to see how our stay was and made sure to make us feel important and welcome. The room was a great size as was the bathroom. Even the pool area was clean, which you don't always find at other hotels. I can't say enough great things about this hotel and the staff. We felt so comfortable, safe and welcome staying here. By far the best "Best Western" I have stayed in anywhere.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, but higher priced than comparable ones”
Reviews.Author: Wandering57
Reviews.Content: We were there in mid/late June for 5 nights. Very nice hotel. As everyone else has said, the pillows and beds were very comfy. I've been to Branson many, many times - stayed in many different hotels - I am not so sure I'd say that this one is "head and shoulders above the rest" (other than the pillows), especially since it's higher priced. It's nice, but nothing overly special. I was not impressed with the breakfast. It was no better/worse than the breakfast at any other hotel in Branson I've stayed at. Eggs and bagels, etc. were definitely of the pre-frozen variety. Nothing against the hotel, but it was very, very hot when we were in Branson and the indoor pool was not refreshing at all. Would have preferred an outdoor pool. The first night we were there, some poor little boy vomited in the pool several times and they had to close it for the rest of the evening -- again, not the hotel's fault, but it was too bad for everyone staying there who wanted to swim. All in all, very nice hotel and if the price was more comparable to other hotels in the area, I'd stay there again. But since it was $20+ more than comparable hotels, I probably won't be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location with little traffic.”
Reviews.Author: CaseIH
Reviews.Content: This Motel is located on a less traveled street but with easy and quick access to the main road (76). Can take bypasses to either end or the middle of the show areas on 76. Has the Shoji , Peirce Arrow and Imax within walking distance. Close to Silver Dollar City and Sheppard of the Hills. The rooms are big and clean. The staff is very pleasant and helpfull. Easy to buy event tickets in the gift shop. The room could have been arranged alittle better is the only negative. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “We checked them all, this is the BEST place to stay”
Reviews.Author: teddy2631
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Branson and we did a lot of looking before we made our choice, and we made the best one. CLEAN, very clean, from the rooms to the parking lot. The room was large and quite, the staff went out of their way to make sure we were happy, and the breakfast was great. The location to all the theatres and entertainment was perfect. There is no reason to stay anywhere else. We were there 6 days and nights.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - loved the pillows so much I tried to buy one”
Reviews.Author: pluzer
Reviews.Content: The hotel was rated a 2 -star but it was more like a 3-4 star. The lobby was very spacious & clean. The beds were very comfortable & the pillows were so WONDERFUL I wanted to take them home. Hotel was very clean & close to everything. Pool area was spacious with hot tub & spa. I'm a very picky person & I was very pleased with this hotel. Will stay here again & recommend to anyone including family. Staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “The BW Music Capital Inn is one of the best in Branson.”
Reviews.Author: old_retired
Reviews.Content: My wife and I love to visit Branson and we always try to stay at the BW Music Capital Inn. It is just off Hwy 76, so traffic is less, yet it is easy to get anywhere in Branson. This trip we saw shows at both ends of town and shopped in between and we never were caught in traffic. The Music Capital Inn is friendly, helpful, clean, inexpensive, and as close to being at home as we can find.

Reviews.Title: “We finally found the hotel to stay at in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: RMc8192
Reviews.Content: We frequently go to Branson and have stayed in a number of hotels. This one was very clean, the staff was friendly and we felt very welcomed. We slept well in the beds and were not bothered by noise in the hallway. The breakfast was a good start to the day. The refrigerator and microwave in the room was a big plus. There was plenty of room to spread out in the room. We will definately stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, great staff.”
Reviews.Author: aehw72
Reviews.Content: Had an awsome time at this hotel. Have stayed here numerous times in the past and have no problems staying here in the future. Love the personal attention you receive at check-in, check-out, and if you ever need anything, the staff treat you with upmost care, as if you are the only guests there. The breakfast buffet is awsome, my kids love it, and has a great variety. Also like the location, off the strip but close to everything you need. I hope you enjoy your stay here as much as we do.

Reviews.Title: “We LOVED this hotel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: urrogers
Reviews.Content: Our first trip to Branson and we stayed five nights at this hotel. The friendly and knowledgeable staff were great, the room was quiet, the entire hotel is sparkling clean from top to bottom, the continental breakfast was good, the pool/hot tub/sauna was fabulous, the location is off the main drag so easily accessible and the gift shop is well stocked. We had a marvelous time and plan to make the Music Capital Inn our home-away-from-home whenever we are in Branson! We recommend this hotel very highly!

Reviews.Title: “IT IS AS GOOD AS EVERYONE SAYS- VERY GOOD RATES TOO”
Reviews.Author: KC traveler 2
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 days in June-Just fine. You can walk to several places to eat lunch/dinner if you need to. Rooms very clean, showers are great. Got a very good rate with expedia too. Staff was very helpful to everyone that came up to the frount desk . No problems at all really. Being #2 with all the places in Branson says it all. Use em!

Reviews.Title: “BEST BEDS, PILLOWS & SHOWERS, FRIENDLY STAFF, BEST LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: tomlynn907
Reviews.Content: This motel had everything that is important to us......all the staff is friendly & helpful (they got us great tickets to shows), our room was clean, quiet & the beds were unbelievably great, showers to die for & the location (we walked across the street to Shoji show) , we walked everywhere & they gave us directions to The Landing (not to be missed, great restaurants, boat rides, great shopping, just beautiful to walk around). We loved the free breakfast where we met lovely folks from all over the world)....the price was very reasonable ....we saved the brochures to give to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Best in Branson”
Reviews.Author: EarthWaterMusic
Reviews.Content: At Music Capital Inn we stayed in a lovely room with great beds. It was quiet, clean, and easily accessible. The Continental breakfast was outstanding with hot waffles, biscuits and gravy, eggs, toast, pastries, and hot and cold cereals. The staff were friendly and accomodating. The pool and jacuzzi were wonderful. The price was right. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Sherry Wallace

Reviews.Title: “Girls yearly trip”
Reviews.Author: sassyvb
Reviews.Content: My mom, myself and my cousin always stay at this motel every year when we go to Branson. The staff is always very nice, the motel is in a good location. When my husband and I go, we stay at this motel. We have never had a bad experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for family to stay”
Reviews.Author: mjgross76
Reviews.Content: We are a family of four with two children age 4 and 2. This was a great place for us to stay with the indoor pool and breakfast with biscuits/gravy, eggs, donuts and cereal for the kids. Our room was very clean and the staff were very friendly. I also enjoyed the free wireless internet throughout the hotel. Overall, this hotel was a great value and close to all the attractions in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Best Motel for the money”
Reviews.Author: ozarkflash
Reviews.Content: I have been staying Here for 4 years. They Have clean rooms friendly staff and a Great Breakfast buffet Nice pool and spa our kids love it! And Brenda at the front Desk Will Help With anything you need to know about Branson Also the In motel ticket office is very helpful. Best Bang for the Buck

Reviews.Title: “There are none better”
Reviews.Author: JoMoMissouri
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just returned from a 3 day weekend stay. This Best Western is the motel we always stay with due to have always had a great experience there. All of the employees are great and will go out of their way to be helpful. The motel is always kept in top notch condition. If you happen to forgot to bring a item with you, they can usually provide it at the front desk or other items can be purchased at the gift shop. The location is convenient to be able to get around Branson by avoiding the traffic delays on "the Strip".They have a front desk attendant on duty 24 hours a day, which is helpful if you ever need special assistance while there, and they are always more than willing to be of help.In the lobby, they have a computer available for their guests to use if needed. There is nothing I can say that would be negative about this motel, nothing at all. Stay here and you will be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quiet, and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: tripp78
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Best Western Music Capital Inn for several nights for a business conference and was very pleased. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. One feature that is not found at many other hotels that I have been at is that the windows open. It was wonderful to relax with a nice breeze blowing through the room. The rooms were spacious and well furnished. My room had a sink and several mirrors right outside of the bathroom which was great for fixing your makeup or hair and not have to be in the bathroom to do it. I had a double full room and the beds were very comfortable. I have stayed at numerous other hotels and have found it hard to find a comfortable bed, as I have back problems. I slept very well here. The hotel was very quiet too. I especially liked the free in-room wifi, refrigerator and microwave. I would love to take my family here for a personal vacation.

Reviews.Title: “A very nice affordable hotel!”
Reviews.Author: cheryl61
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed this hotel. It was very clean everywhere! The pool area, breakfast area, lobby area and our room, all very clean. All of the staff we encountered were very nice and helpful. The breakfast was very good with biscuits & gravy, scrambled eggs, oatmeal, waffles and just about everything else you could want. The pool and hot tub was very nice. It is located on Shepard of the Hills Expressway just off the main drag. That was great. We had plenty of towels in our room every day. The bathroom floor needed some extra cleaning, but we've never stayed in a hotel with tile floor that couldn't use some detail cleaning! They had a luggage cart so you didn't have to go to your car 50 times to unpack. We bought tickets to almost everything on site from the gift shop. They honored our request for a room on the lower level. We paid a little more and got a microwave & frig (which were very clean!). We highly recommend this hotel and we will always stay here everytime we go to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “"the BEST' Bestwestern anywhere!!!”
Reviews.Author: mcecm
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Music Capital Inn for four nights in the honeymoon suite. We think it was the nicest hotel room that we have ever had. We have stayed in some extremely upscale places and this was by far the best. This hotel is very quiet, clean and well run. We would highly recommend the use of their in-house show ticket office. We booked five shows and had excellent seats for every one of them. We don't have anything negative to say, and would encourage people to try this hotel. It's great!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: travelorfromtx
Reviews.Content: Above average rating for the price paid of $79. We had a good night's rest because unlike some newer hotels, the air condtioner could be cranked down to low temperatures. The walls were thin, but the cold air let us sleep through the noise. The continental breakfast closes promptly at 9:45, and the lady cleaning up the breakfast will make sure you know if you come in too late. The indoor pool was nice and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Branson!!”
Reviews.Author: Biggles4
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here two different times and wouldn't stay at any other place in Branson. The staff here are very friendly and are willing to go out of their way to help in any way. The rooms are extremely clean and tidy. My daughter especially enjoys the pool area (yes, it is very clean). This place has all the comforts of home! We love it!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: skabcop
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, great front desk, awesome location, will stay there again! Only negative was the housekeeping staff sit by the side doors to smoke, but we simply used the door on the other side and problem solved.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: DKMBJM
Reviews.Content: Very nice place to stay...clean, good location, friendly, affordable

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN Music Capital Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 3257 Shepherd of the Hills Expwy, Branson, MO 65616-8104
